camera.h
========

**Overview**\ 
--------------

**Related Modules:**

`MultiMedia_Camera <multimedia_camera.md>`__

**Description:**

Declares functions in the **Camera** class to implement camera
operations.

**Since:**

1.0

**Version:**

1.0

-------------
